resources.string: I think you are missing somethingâ€¦
WikipediaTunes is going to recommend music based on the some featured article. Why not try listening to these songs while you read the article? Keep up the work Adrian. You\'re great.
Don\'t you want to know what\'s going on in the world but don\'t want to read lengthy news articles? Cultured solves that.
Select an article topic that interests you and from there you\'ll be able to learn more about the people, organizations, and countries involved.\n \nHappy Travels.
